post.summary: Creates a new Work Item and its associated data.
post.description: Note that the API caller must have the 'Create' permission for the Work Type being created.

200.description:
Success

Returns the details for the created Work Item.

400.description:
Bad Request.

The Work Item could not be created due to an invalid configuration specified in the request.
For example, the request specified a Work Type system name that does not exist.

Check the logs for more details.

403.description:
Forbidden.

The caller does not have the correct permission (see the response body for more information).

500.description:
Error.

Something went wrong when trying to create the Work Item.

Check the logs for more details.

put.summary: Updates a Work Item and its associated data.
put.description:
Note: If the caller is authenticated as a user, that user must have a role with the `core.sharedo.update` permission on the Work Item to be updated.

If the caller does not have a user context, the client must have the `core.sharedo.updateAny` system permission.

parameters.name: workItemId
parameters.description: The ID of the Work Item to update.

200.description:
Success

Returns the details for the created Work Item.

400.description:
Bad Request.

The Work Item could not be created due to an invalid configuration specified in the request.
For example, the request specified a Work Type system name that does not exist.

Check the logs for more details.

403.description:
Forbidden.

The caller does not have the correct permission (see the response body for more information).

500.description:
Error.

Something went wrong when trying to create the Work Item.

Check the logs for more details.

get.summary: Gets a Work Item and its associated data.

parameters.name: workItemId
parameters.description: The ID of the Work Item to get.

200.description:
Success

Returns a summary of the Work Item.

404.description:
Not Found.

A Work Item with this ID could not be found.
